Class Files

java.lang.Object
Files
public class Files extends Object
This class is being used to allow the user to read, write & copy from a file, decipher given text in mystery.txt and process, format & calculate the average time of details.txt as well as output a 2D-Number array
Version:
1.0
Author:
A.Shafiei
